lead_paragraph: Dr. David H. Newman, who pleaded not guilty to the charges, was arrested on Jan. 19 after two women complained to the police. Since then two more women have come forward, the authorities said.

headline.print_headline: E.R. Doctor Pleads Not Guilty to Sexual Abuse of 4 Female Patients
headline.main: Former Mt. Sinai Doctor Charged With Sexually Abusing 4 Women

snippet: Dr. David H. Newman, who pleaded not guilty to the charges, was arrested on Jan. 19 after two women complained to the police. Since then two more women have come forward, the authorities said.
abstract: Dr David H Newman pleads not guilty in State Supreme Court in Manhattan to sexually abusing 4 female patients at Mount Sinai Hospital emergency room; Newman, who was arrested in January, has been fired from hospital.
